title: 99% Invisible-69- The Brief and Tumultuous Life of the New UC Logo
description: If you’re not from California, or missed this bit of news, the University of California has a new logo. Or rather had a new logo. To be more precise they had a new “visual identity system,” which is the kind … Continue reading →
